isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - BENDIX E6-TREADLE AND E7-SUSPENDED PEDAL TYPE (FOOT) BRAKE VALVES - INSTALL

step1.para: Start all air lines into the (foot) brake valve. Be sure the lines are in the same fitting location from which the line was removed.
Position (foot) brake valve onto mounting plate, and secure with screws.
Tighten all air lines that are attached to the brake (foot) valve.

Before putting vehicle back into service, check all air connections that were removed for leaks. Use a soap solution on connections and check for leaks (bubbles). No leaks on air line connections are acceptable.
Position valve into mounting plate. Install mounting bolts, but do not tighten.
Start all air lines. Be sure that the lines are on the same connections from which the lines were removed. After all lines have been started, tighten all lines.
Install coolant reservoir or air filter if applicable.

Before putting vehicle back into service, check all air connections that were removed for leaks. Use a soap solution on connections and check for leaks (bubbles). No leaks on air line connections are acceptable.
